plugins.name: Strip all video metadata from file
plugins.author: Josh.5

plugins.name: Re-order audio streams by language
plugins.author: Josh.5
plugins.description:
Specify a language tag for Unmanic to try and put as 1st audio track.

In the plugin settings, specify a 'Search String'. The plugin will search the files to find matching audio tracks. The matching audio tracks will be moved to the 1st audio track.

Examples of search strings:
  - 'en'
  - 'fr'
  - 'de'

plugins.name: Extract text subtitle streams to SRT files
plugins.author: Josh.5
plugins.description:
This plugin will extract any text based subtitle streams found in the given file and save them as *.srt files in the same directory as the original file.

Requires Unmanic >= v0.0.5.

plugins.name: Re-order subtitle streams by language
plugins.author: Josh.5
plugins.description:
Specify a language tag for Unmanic to try and put as 1st subtitle track.

In the plugin settings, specify a 'Search String'. The plugin will search the files to find matching subtitle tracks. The matching subtitle tracks will be moved to the 1st subtitle track position.

Examples of search strings:
  - 'en'
  - 'fr'
  - 'de'

plugins.name: Notify Plex
plugins.author: Josh.5
plugins.description:
Notify Plex on completion of a task.

To find your Plex token, follow the instructions found here: [url]https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436-finding-an-authentication-token-x-plex-token/[/url]

plugins.name: Strip all image streams from file
plugins.author: Josh.5
plugins.description: Removes all image streams (if any exists).

plugins.author: Josh.5
plugins.description:
Specify paths for Unmanic to ignore within your library path.

Enter line-separated regex.

Examples:
 [list][*][color=red]^.*.*\(.*\).*\..*$[/color] - Ignore files and folders containing parentheses '()' [*][color=red]^.*\/\.ignore_folder\/.*$[/color] - Ignore folders containing '/.ignore_folder/' [/list]
plugins.name: Path Ignore
